p: During 2020, 3-phenylcoumarins were also studied as xanthine oxidase inhibitors [ 43]. Methoxy and nitro substituents were introduced into the framework. The best compound in the series proved to be 3-(4-methoxyphenyl)-6-nitrocoumarin, with an IC 50 = 8.4 Î¼M, being also non-cytotoxic in B16F10 cells.
